channel.title: meeting on Nautilus Project
channel.description: Recent content in meeting on Nautilus Project

item.title: Kick Off!
item.description: On the 3th of February 2021, the kick-off meeting of the NAUTILUS project took place at the premises of the Fundaci√≥ Joan Costa Roma in Consorci Sanitari de Terrassa. Researchers from the different consortium members and supporting clinical centers met to kick off the project and discuss the study to be performed and agree on the different protocols and tasks. This meeting will guide the research actions in the coming months and support selecting participants in the study tests1.
